A DIGITAL DEVELOPER BASED OUT OF DUBLIN, IRELAND.

Get in touch

"We shall not cease from exploration, and the end of all our exploring will be to arrive where we started and know the place for the first time" -- T.S. Eliot

A bit about me.

Howdy! I'm Greg, a 25 year old lad currently working in Rothco, a creative agency based in Dublin, Ireland. I'm a Digital Developer and part of the tech team.

My work primarily consists of working on digital display campaigns. I predominantly work on our more complex campaigns using platforms such as DoubleClick Studio, Celtra, Sizmek, Google Web Designer and Spongecell. These campaigns can range from rich media formats to fully fledged dynamic creatives as part of a programmatic campaign.

I graduated from the Institute of Technology, Blanchardstown in 2015 with an honors degree in Creative Digital Media. Over the past couple of years I've worked on countless campaigns for clients such as AIB, Defense Forces, Heineken, National Lottery and much more.

Work stuff aside, I like to spend my free time relaxing with the family (that's my Mam, two sisters, pet dog called Harvey and pet Lizard called Len). I love learning new things, no matter what it pertains to. I love a good book and I'm constantly listening to podcasts. I'm also a big football fan (GGMU!) and can never turn down a good gaming session.
